column1: Coronavirus is such a badass name ngl
RT @hfz_garcia: Cancel Phase 1. Go back to normal Circuit Breaker where everyone just can't go out and saman here and there. You see... SGe…

Just wash your hands and cover your mouth when you cough. Baby boomers and people with existing conditions are the most at risk. This coronavirus is likely permanent, coming seasonally along with cold and flu. If you catch it, 8 times out of 10 you won’t even go to the drs.
